title: Riot, Twisted Treeline Soloqueue please
body:
Please. Matchmaking for normals is not competitive enough, and I can't do ranked 3s all the time. More people would play Twisted Treeline if we had a solo queue. I know you had it on PBE for a while, but please try it on live just as a test. You've done tests before with things like Team Builder.  If it wrecks the queue times you can take it down.

Note: I believe it should be SOLO queue not Solo/duo queue.

replies.body:
Also, we need a draft pick for 3v3 that is not ranked. Because certain champions have overpowered the map for so long over it's history, it's been a trend that certain champions will beat the majority and that's not fun to play against all the time in blind pick.

E.g {{champion:59}}
The temptation to pick {{champion:25}} is too great.
As a TT main since ive been playing the game, I fully support this and have asked before. Riot just doesn't wanna put it in.

>
> As a TT main since ive been playing the game, I fully support this and have asked before. Riot just doesn't wanna put it in.

It's called laziness, anything they don't get $ with they go the lazy route...but hey we got chromas now!!YAY.

> [{quoted}](name=AkabaneKun,realm=EUW,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=NEKEEJ0g,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-04-15T15:01:50.544+0000)
>
> It's called laziness, anything they don't get $ with they go the lazy route...but hey we got chromas now!!YAY.

I remember back in s2 when riot wasn't as lazy I mean damn they gave us the new TT map. Then, LCS hit off hard. I also fully refused to buy recolors back in the day. I only bought toxic mundo cause I actually like the recolor and its legacy :P

This has been discussed before. I believe the reason given was that the TT (and the Dominion, because some of them also want this) communities are very small. A ranked solo system would:
a) split the small community even further, resulting in much longer queue times
b) have awful matchmaking given that there aren't that many people in each division
c) have even longer queue times because of b)

Draft-Pick without ranked would be fine, but i don´t support a SoloQ in such a highly snowballing map that relies heavily onto teamwork from the get go (yea, i also dislike it in SR already, but at least there you have a Soloesc laning-phase at the begining and not just rotational gameplay form min 2 onwards).
No; people actually play the Treeline. :P

People actually play Dom too, and on a much more serious competitive level.  It's way better balanced than TT, and has come a huge way from its beginnings.  In the maps' current states, Dom is more deserving of the ranked queue, but they both really need balance team to get off their asses and make some changes.

I only want draft pick, seriously the mode is absurdly unbalanced, and getting couterpicked in TT most of the time spells gg wp since you can't even farm and get pushed into your tower meaning they can invade your whole side of the map free, a mode like this shouldn't even have blind pick.
As a ranked SR player...I would also queue for TT if it was soloqueue because TT can be fun...just not in blind pick...and I don't have friends...
